Articles.Content: can some one help I,am look for the GEMINI ships all of them

Well you can go KerbalStuff and search for the K2, it's a stockalike take on the Gemini capsule. Or the mark one laboratories, which is essentially a mk1 command pod expanded to act like both a Gemini capsule and a Big G(emini). Or you could use FASA, which contains a more realistic version of the Gemini capsule, in fact it's as close as you can get. Or lastly you can get the Corvus 1.25 command pod from KerbalStuff. It's like the K2 as it's a stockalike take on the Gemini capsule, but more to it.

Also by "all of them", I'm assuming you want a Titan II with the Gemini spacecraft ontop? And a Atlas IIIB with the Agena ontop? If you want to go far out, a Titan IIIC with the Big Gemini+MOL? Explain what your after specifically. Gemini was a period of a lot of proposals and ideas, some of which, never happened.
Look for Corvus. It is a multi part Gemini mod that includes all of the primary components of the Gemini spacecraft.
Tantares has a nice gemini capsule and even a proper Big G expansion pod.
thank you you all  , now iam flying the big G
